Modified iris dataset

Source: R/dataset.R
iris2.Rd

Modified iris dataset so:

  • every column is labelled (using label attribute from expss package, compatible with Hmisc package)

  • Species column is considered as factor

See iris for more informations on the original "Edgar Anderson's Iris Data" dataset.

iris2

Format

A data frame with 150 observations on 5 variables with labels.

Source

library(dplyr)
iris2 = iris %>% 
    mutate_at("Species", factor) %>% 
    expss::apply_labels( #I also could have used [import_labels] or even `Hmisc::label`
        Species = "Specie",
        Sepal.Length = "Length of Sepal",
        Sepal.Width = "Width of Sepal",
        Petal.Length = "Length of Petal",
        Petal.Width = "Width of Petal"
    ) %>% 
    as_tibble()

Examples

library(crosstable)
ct=crosstable(iris2, by=Species)
ct

#>             .id           label   variable        setosa    versicolor
#> 1  Sepal.Length Length of Sepal  Min / Max     4.3 / 5.8     4.9 / 7.0
#> 2  Sepal.Length Length of Sepal  Med [IQR] 5.0 [4.8;5.2] 5.9 [5.6;6.3]
#> 3  Sepal.Length Length of Sepal Mean (std)     5.0 (0.4)     5.9 (0.5)
#> 4  Sepal.Length Length of Sepal     N (NA)        50 (0)        50 (0)
#> 5   Sepal.Width  Width of Sepal  Min / Max     2.3 / 4.4     2.0 / 3.4
#> 6   Sepal.Width  Width of Sepal  Med [IQR] 3.4 [3.2;3.7] 2.8 [2.5;3.0]
#> 7   Sepal.Width  Width of Sepal Mean (std)     3.4 (0.4)     2.8 (0.3)
#> 8   Sepal.Width  Width of Sepal     N (NA)        50 (0)        50 (0)
#> 9  Petal.Length Length of Petal  Min / Max     1.0 / 1.9     3.0 / 5.1
#> 10 Petal.Length Length of Petal  Med [IQR] 1.5 [1.4;1.6] 4.3 [4.0;4.6]
#> 11 Petal.Length Length of Petal Mean (std)     1.5 (0.2)     4.3 (0.5)
#> 12 Petal.Length Length of Petal     N (NA)        50 (0)        50 (0)
#> 13  Petal.Width  Width of Petal  Min / Max     0.1 / 0.6     1.0 / 1.8
#> 14  Petal.Width  Width of Petal  Med [IQR] 0.2 [0.2;0.3] 1.3 [1.2;1.5]
#> 15  Petal.Width  Width of Petal Mean (std)     0.2 (0.1)     1.3 (0.2)
#> 16  Petal.Width  Width of Petal     N (NA)        50 (0)        50 (0)
#>        virginica
#> 1      4.9 / 7.9
#> 2  6.5 [6.2;6.9]
#> 3      6.6 (0.6)
#> 4         50 (0)
#> 5      2.2 / 3.8
#> 6  3.0 [2.8;3.2]
#> 7      3.0 (0.3)
#> 8         50 (0)
#> 9      4.5 / 6.9

#> 11     5.6 (0.6)
#> 12        50 (0)
#> 13     1.4 / 2.5
#> 14 2.0 [1.8;2.3]
#> 15     2.0 (0.3)
#> 16        50 (0)
as_flextable(ct)
